- Storage: Storing data on external hard drives is not advised due to risk of data loss. RDR is a solution for data sharing but not suitable for the storage of active data.  It is recommended to use a KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup, you can consult the storage guide to compare available solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. In addition, you may find KU Leuvenâ€™s GitLab platform helpful for storing, tracking, and collaborating on your code: https://gitlab.kuleuven.be/
